title: 640: ELON MUSK REVEALS SPACEX OWNS BITCOIN AND HE PERSONALLY OWNS BTC - ‘I MIGHT PUMP BUT I DON’T DUMP’
description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk has revealed for the first time that his firm SpaceX owns Bitcoin and that Tesla may be close to accepting BTC payments again after looking into BTC’s sustainability.

He did add that: “We’re not selling any Bitcoin, nor am I selling anything personally or nor is SpaceX selling any Bitcoin.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

content:encoded:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk has revealed for the first time that his firm SpaceX owns Bitcoin and that Tesla may be close to accepting BTC payments again after looking into BTC’s sustainability. He did add that: “We’re not selling any Bitcoin, nor am I selling anything personally or nor is SpaceX selling any Bitcoin.” For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
